1.title: Pilot
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Stoney Parker is a story maker. An average guy with a 'Life is Good' existence, he lives his life one amazing story at a time. Owner of 'The 'Cue', the best BBQ joint in Memphis, Stoney heads up the worlds best cooking team full of misfits and together, they cook up some of the most hilarious stories that have ever been told... and they love making them. Constantly avoiding attacks by his nemesis, Chuck 'Daddy Pig' Burgess, owner of 'Big Daddy Pig's', the largest BBQ chain in the Southeast, stupidity is guaranteed. These are the stories of 'The 'Cue'.
imdb.title: The 'Cue
